policies.ignoreDirectoryErrorsHelp: Continue snapshot even if individual directories cannot be read
policies.maxParallelSnapshotsHelp: Maximum number of snapshots to upload in parallel
policies.maxParallelFileReadsHelp: Maximum number of files to read in parallel during upload
